p: Had lovely time with Enat, Oddie, Alice & Hiddy. Had lunch with Bovard at his country home & a 3 - hour visit with him. Fine trip over to Montgomery, and a worth - while affair at the college. Max is enjoying it all. She says to tell you she washes her face at least once a day. Talked 2 1/2 hrs to classes yesterday morning.
No place to stay at Montgomery, but Dr. Vining (Dr. House's friend) had us to his home. Very pleasant. Am looking forward to more word from you at Morgantown.
